Text.Name: BaiManMibao
Text.IVNUMBER.0.FabaoData.SpecialAbility.0.De: Every 10th attack will cast a spell on the target enemy.

Text.Name: HeiShanMibao
Text.IVNUMBER.0.FabaoData.SpecialAbility.0.De: 8% of damage dealt will be replenished to the artifact's Qi.

Text.Name: ZhengYiMibao
Text.IVNUMBER.0.FabaoData.SpecialAbility.0.De: Every 5 attacks reduces skill cooldown by 1 second.

Text.Name: JiuHuaMibao
Text.IVNUMBER.0.FabaoData.SpecialAbility.0.De: Increases damage to targets of Wood element by 80%.

Text.Name: WuLianMibao
Text.IVNUMBER.0.FabaoData.SpecialAbility.0.De: Increases damage to targets of Earth element by 80%.

Text.Name: ShuShanMibao
Text.IVNUMBER.0.FabaoData.SpecialAbility.0.De: Increases damage to targets of Fire element by 80%.

Text.Name: KunLunMibao
Text.IVNUMBER.0.FabaoData.SpecialAbility.0.De: Increases damage to targets of Water element by 80%.

Text.Name: XianKongMibao
Text.IVNUMBER.0.FabaoData.SpecialAbility.0.De: Increases damage to targets of Metal element by 80%.

Text.Name: DanXiaMibao
Text.IVNUMBER.0.FabaoData.SpecialAbility.0.De: Deals 1.25x damage when fighting against other artifacts.

Text.Name: HeHuanMibao
Text.IVNUMBER.0.FabaoData.SpecialAbility.0.De: Surrounding the whole body, it focuses on defense and will not automatically attack.
